suppress.notes: Vulnerability in Guava if using com.google.common.io.Files.createTempDir. No version exists without this vulnerability, but the function is marked as deprecated in version 30+ We do not use this function in the code so handled as false positive. file name: guava-31.1-jre.jar

Disputed. The vendor's perspective is that this is not a valid vulnerability report, because the steps of constructing a cyclic data structure and trying to serialize it cannot be achieved by an external attacker. file name: jackson-databind-2.15.2.jar
Disputed as it is a user configuration issue and not a problem with Netty. file name: netty-handler-4.1.98.Final.jar
